member.summary: Substitui a propriedade CurrentUICulture do thread atual para todas as pesquisas de recursos que usam essa classe de recurso de tipo de alta segurança.

member.summary: Executes a command on server.
member.param: Indicates the command to execute on the server.
member.returns: Returns an object containing the server reply information.

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.TryExecute(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to execute a command on server.
member.param: Indicates the command to execute on the server.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if command execution successfull, otherwise returns False.

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.FileExists(System.String,System.Net.FtpClient.FtpListOption)
member.summary: Checks if a file exist on server.
member.param: Options that dictate how a list is performed ans what information is gathered.

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.GetChecksum(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a checksum of the given file using a checksumming method that the server supports, if any. The algorithm used goes in this order: 1. HASH command (server preferred algorithm). 2. MD5 / XMD5 commands 3. XSHA1 command 4. XSHA256 command 5. XSHA512 command 6. XCRC command

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.VerifyChecksum(System.String,System.String,System.Net.FtpClient.FtpHashAlgorithm)
member.summary: Gets the checksum of file on server and compare it with the checksum of local file.
member.param: Indicates the local disk file path.
Indicates the algorithm that should be used to verify checksums.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if both checksums are equal, otherwise returns False.

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.GetFileSize(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the size of file.

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.GetHashAlgorithm
member.summary: Gets the currently HASH algorithm used for the HASH command on server.

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.GetModifiedTime(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the modified time of file.

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.UploadFile(System.Net.WebClient@,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uploads a file to FTP.
member.param: Indicates the WebClient object to upload the file.
Specifies the local path where to save the downloaded file.
Indicates whether the download should be an Asynchronous operation, to raise WebClient events.

member.name: M:LeitorCodigoBarras.FTP.DownloadFile(System.Net.WebClient@,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Downloads a file from FTP.
member.param: Indicates the WebClient object to download the file.
Specifies the local path where to save the downloaded file.
Indicates whether the download should be an Asynchronous operation, to raise WebClient events.
